name: Power Ownage
description:
Darn power bugs again. Someone musta left batteries out of the fridge.

Controls:

W - forward

S - backpedal

A - strafe left

D - strafe right

Move mouse to the sides to look around and aim

Move mouse up and down to move crosshair back and forth

Left click to mark targets

Credits:

"In a Heartbeat", "Harmful or Fatal" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

Everything else: Me and my dearest Unity
